requirements: Applicant must be at least 21 years of age
Business must be within Cavite, Laguna, Batangas, and Quezon provinces
Business must be operational for at least 3 years
Business must have at least 1 employee
DTI Certificate or SEC Certificate with latest General Information Sheet (GIS)
Audited Financial Statements (AFS) with Income Tax Returns (ITR) for the latest 1-3 years stamped received by BIR
Interim Financial Statements 2019 and/or management report (balance sheet and income statement)
Latest Accounts Receivable Ageing Report
Latest 6 months statement of account for all corporate bank account (online bank statements or passbooks 'must include account name and number'
Valid ID of company President w/ specimen signature/s
Outstanding Loans and Statement of Collaterals
SALN Details
Business Continuity Plan (BCP)

other_requirements.title: SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP
documents: Latest original 3 months bank statements and bank certification
Copy of Mayor’s and Barangay Business permit
Photocopy of at least 2 Government-issued IDs
Pictures of the business and/or inventory
Proof of billing for your business and residence (i.e. electricity / water / cable)
Hand-drawn sketch of your business and residence location

other_requirements.title: Additional documents for CORPORATION
documents: SEC registration with Article of Incorporation & By Laws

other_requirements.title: (Authority to obtain loan in his/her personal capacity)
documents: Income Tax Return with Audited Financial Statements

requirements: Business must be registered to DTI or SEC
Business is operational for at least 1 year
Has an active checking account at any bank for at least 6 months
Must be 18 to 60 years of age
Must be a Filipino citizen
With steady source of income proving paying capacity
Must be 18 to 60 years of age
Must be a Filipino citizen
With steady source of income proving paying capacity

other_requirements.title: Investree will reach out to you for the next steps after submission.
Prepare the following:
documents: Last 3 to 5 completed and paid transactions with your client indicated in the submitted PO and/o invoice
Bank statements of the last 6 months (operational bank account)
Bank statements of the last 6 months (payment receiving bank account)

documents: Filled up Shareholder Information Sheet (email salesteam@investree.ph)
TIN Document (Showing TIN) of each shareholder
